description: T.1 Norway Maple - 1.5-2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points.T.2 Silver Birch - 1.5-2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points.T.3 Liquid Amber - 2-3m Height reduction and reduce overextended laterals back in line with main crown shape, with all cuts to suitable growth points.H.1 Conifer Hedge - Fell (exempt).
